DOC.detailed_description: The prevalence abnormality blood pressure ( ABP ) , variability heart rate ( HRV ) liver fat content increase woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) . We hypothesise fish oil beneficial effect endpoint cardiometabolic parameter cholesterol liver function woman PCOS . This crossover study 40 obese woman PCOS therefore examine effect fish oil parameter compare placebo ( olive oil ) . Subjects PCOS participate previous study research group approach recruitment , eligible subject within endocrine clinic chief co-investigators .
DOC.criteria: Overweight/obese woman PCOS per 1990 NIH criterion ( see ) Nonsmokers Age > 18 year , premenopausal Acceptable have/be treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus and/or dyslipidaemia Acceptable take oral contraceptive pill Uncontrolled hypertension ( BP > 160/100mmHg ) Known comorbidities include liver renal disease Already take fish oil supplement Other intercurrent illness ( major surgery , CV event ) Smokers Alcohol intake > 20g/day Pregnancy Any metallic implant ( contraindication MRI ) .
